Non-towered airport opps / Can an I Pad save your life?

Using Technology to Increase Safety & Preventing Takeoff and Landing Accidents

Guest speakers: Jim Adams, Paul Carroll, Ken MacDonald
Attend this exciting event featuring two briefings!

First we’ll discuss general aviation takeoff, approach and landing accidents and best practices for preventing them. We'll also address operations at tower controlled airports and discuss if pilots are always obligated to follow ATC instructions?

The second half of the program will examine the way technology is changing the way we fly. Many pilots are flying with an iPad in the cockpit but still purchase and carry paper charts. Is it considered "safe" to fly with just an iPad?

Don't miss the COOKOUT at 6:00 PM prior to the seminar.

Select Number: EA6348949

http://www.faasafety.gov/

We will also have some exciting updates on our Hangar project !

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

"Where else can you have this much excitement for $30 bucks a year?"
